name: Leaping For Life
description:
Reach the top of the tower before the lava catches up to you. But be careful! Every time you jump, you lose a life point!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Jump 
R - Restart

Leaping for Life was created by Daniel HCC for Mini Jam 128: Health.

Asset packs:
- DOTween - Demigiant
- Total Music Collection - Muz Station Productions
